content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: SVPRESP
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: SVPRESP
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000037
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when SVPRESP not "Y" or null.
Outcome:
  Message: SVPRESP is not null and not equal to "Y". Values should be "Y" or null.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0653
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Values should be "Y" or null.
                Document: SDTM v2.0
                Section: Subject Visits
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - SV

json.Description: Raise an error when SVPRESP not "Y" or null.

Outcome.Message: SVPRESP is not null and not equal to "Y". Values should be "Y" or null.
